about_the_game:
Mercenaries organized by a local organization in the northern part of the state invaded and hijacked local chemical factories and other facilities, and there have been reports of frequent suspicious activities in the area recently. To this end, the government has established a special task force, codenamed "HuntingHawk", in an attempt to solve the problem as quickly as possible, and the player's character, Sverre Fehn, is one of them...
Operation HuntingHawk : Breakthrough is a first person shooter game that emphasizes a smooth combat experience. Players will take on the role of well-trained special forces member Sverre Fehn to carry out missions, fight against threatening mercenaries and infected individuals, and try to survive, gradually uncovering the truth behind the events and the conspiracy behind them.

Game features:

  • Rich weapon selection: The game provides players with a total of 19 available weapons, ranging from cold weapons to various firearms. The animations and sound effects of the weapons are realistic and smooth, and their handling feels natural and comfortable.
  • Diverse scenes: factories, prisons, warehouses, snow covered areas, cities, mines, sewers... The game will lead players to different areas and engage in battles with enemies in various scenes. Players can also use objects in the environment to bring advantages to battles.
  • Smooth combat experience: Whether it's frontal assault or stealth assassination, players can always get pleasure in battle. Facing over 10 types of ordinary enemies and 3 different boss enemies, and enjoy each battle with our unique hitting and killing feedback.
  • Excellent soundtrack: Selected 8+ high-quality music pieces as the game's BGM, and players can directly obtain the game's original sound in the game file directory.



(Before running the game for the first time, please open the game file directory and select 'Replace High DPI Scaling Behavior. Scaling Execution: Application' in Operation HuntingHawk.exe → Properties → Compatibility → Change High DPI Settings. Otherwise the resolution of the game during runtime may be incorrect.)

(If the game is running at an extremely low frame rate in training levels, please open the Nvidia/AMD control panel and ensure that you are running the application on a high-performance GPU rather than your onboard GPU)

(The game program is created by a single developer and may contain other errors. Please leave feedback in the game discussion forum or review.)
detailed_description:
Mercenaries organized by a local organization in the northern part of the state invaded and hijacked local chemical factories and other facilities, and there have been reports of frequent suspicious activities in the area recently. To this end, the government has established a special task force, codenamed "HuntingHawk", in an attempt to solve the problem as quickly as possible, and the player's character, Sverre Fehn, is one of them...
Operation HuntingHawk : Breakthrough is a first person shooter game that emphasizes a smooth combat experience. Players will take on the role of well-trained special forces member Sverre Fehn to carry out missions, fight against threatening mercenaries and infected individuals, and try to survive, gradually uncovering the truth behind the events and the conspiracy behind them.

Game features:

  • Rich weapon selection: The game provides players with a total of 19 available weapons, ranging from cold weapons to various firearms. The animations and sound effects of the weapons are realistic and smooth, and their handling feels natural and comfortable.
  • Diverse scenes: factories, prisons, warehouses, snow covered areas, cities, mines, sewers... The game will lead players to different areas and engage in battles with enemies in various scenes. Players can also use objects in the environment to bring advantages to battles.
  • Smooth combat experience: Whether it's frontal assault or stealth assassination, players can always get pleasure in battle. Facing over 10 types of ordinary enemies and 3 different boss enemies, and enjoy each battle with our unique hitting and killing feedback.
  • Excellent soundtrack: Selected 8+ high-quality music pieces as the game's BGM, and players can directly obtain the game's original sound in the game file directory.



(Before running the game for the first time, please open the game file directory and select 'Replace High DPI Scaling Behavior. Scaling Execution: Application' in Operation HuntingHawk.exe → Properties → Compatibility → Change High DPI Settings. Otherwise the resolution of the game during runtime may be incorrect.)

(If the game is running at an extremely low frame rate in training levels, please open the Nvidia/AMD control panel and ensure that you are running the application on a high-performance GPU rather than your onboard GPU)

(The game program is created by a single developer and may contain other errors. Please leave feedback in the game discussion forum or review.)
name: Operation HuntingHawk : Breakthrough

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780 or AMD RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or AMD RX 5600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Operation HuntingHawk : Breakthrough is a fast-paced single player first person shooter game that offers 9 highly playable levels. Players will face dangerous and challenging enemies and engage in intense battles with them.
